message: My site is running absurdly slow. Not sure what I am missing. I am new to ep.io, so I have to believe that there is something in my settings that is just not right. Anyone have any thoughts what might make a site to run really slow?

I know that part of an initial page load is due to the number of JS/CSS files being loaded because I have not compiled them into a single smaller file yet. However, most of my calls to the server are through AJAX requests that are just returning a couple of lines of JSON. This should (in theory) be a fairly quick process. What am I missing?
It's possible that you were testing at a time the servers were under stress. If you are still having this issue, it might be worthwhile popping over to #epio on Freenode.
Is it possible for you to post your URL so we can see for ourselves?
I could, but the whole site is (a) still under development, and (b) entirely password protected.
